# Inn
## Overview
**Inn:** This traveler’s inn has all you need to host up to twenty guests and a dozen mounts.

*Components: [[Tavern, Basic|Basic tavern]]*, [[Stable, Basic|basic stables]] (2), [[Bedrooms, Basic|basic bedrooms]] (10), [[Kitchen, Fancy|fancy kitchen]], [[Servants' Quarters|servants’ quarters]], [[Storage, Basic|basic storage]]; *Size:* 16 stronghold spaces; *Cost:* 13,050 gp.

*Staff:* Cooks (2), grooms (2), servants (2); *Upkeep:* 21 gp per month.
